document.heading: Day Care Policy Amendment Act of 1998

history.narrative: Law 12-216, the “Day Care Policy Amendment Act of 1998,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 12-328, which was referred to the Committee on Human Services. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on October 6, 1998, and November 10, 1998, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 9, 1998, it was assigned Act No. 12-531 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 12-216 became effective on April 13, 1999.
